name: dindinho-monorepo
description: Monorepo do projeto Dindinho - PWA Financeiro

scripts.quality:ci: turbo run lint typecheck build test test:integration --continue && npm run test:e2e:ci
scripts.setup:dev: npm run db:up && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run seed
scripts.setup:prod: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:deploy && npm run seed:prod
scripts.test:e2e: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d && E2E_BACKEND_HEALTH_URL=http://localhost:3000/health E2E_API_URL=http://localhost:3000 npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down
scripts.test:e2e:ci: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d --build && E2E_BACKEND_HEALTH_URL=http://localhost:3000/health E2E_API_URL=http://localhost:3000 npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts --reporter=dot && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down
scripts.prepare: node -e "if (process.env.HUSKY !== '0' && process.env.NODE_ENV !== 'production') { try { const husky = require('husky'); (husky.install || husky.default || (() => {}))() } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e } }"

author: Forja Corp
